title: Network Services Gateway
description: Specify configuration for Nuage Metro√Ü NSGvs.

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the NSGv VM on the hypervisor/vcenter

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of environment into which the NSGv will be instantiated

target_server.title: Target Server hostname
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor or vCenter server where the NSGv will be instantiated

bootstrap_method.title: Bootstrap Method
bootstrap_method.description: Bootstrap method for the NSGv. The default is 'none' which means no bootstrap will be performed. 'zfb_metro' creates a boostrap ISO file based on the contents of the file nsgv_bootstrap.yml. 'zfb_external' is used when a 3rd-party ISO file is to be used.

iso_path.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Directory
iso_path.description: Local path to the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

iso_file.title: External Bootstrap ISO File Name
iso_file.description: Name of the 3rd-party ISO file to use for bootstrap. Only required when bootstrap_method id set to 'zfb_external'

nsgv_ip.title: IP Address to assign to NSGv by VNSUtil

nsgv_mac.title: NSGV MAC Address
nsgv_mac.description: MAC address the proxy will use to recognize the NSGV at boot/DHCP time. Only required when bootstrap_method is set to 'zfb_metro'

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the NSG VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the NSG VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_host_reference.title: vCenter Host Reference
vcenter_host_reference.description: Requires ovftool 4.3. Reference to the host on the vCenter cluster on which to deploy Nuage components

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the NSG VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

aws_upgrade_ami_id.title: AWS AMI ID for Upgrading Instance
aws_upgrade_ami_id.description: AMI ID of the upgraded image

aws_instance_type.title: AWS Instance Type
aws_instance_type.description: Instance Type of the AWS Instance

aws_key_name.title: AWS Keypair Name
aws_key_name.description: Name of the Keypair used to connect to VPC

provision_vpc_cidr.title: AWS Provision VPC CIDR
provision_vpc_cidr.description: CIDR for provisioning a VPC for the NSGv on AWS

provision_vpc_nsg_wan_subnet_cidr.title: AWS Provision VPC NSG WAN Subnet CIDR
provision_vpc_nsg_wan_subnet_cidr.description: WAN Subnet CIDR for provisioning a VPC for the NSGv on AWS

provision_vpc_nsg_lan_subnet_cidr.title: AWS Provision VPC NSG LAN Subnet CIDR
provision_vpc_nsg_lan_subnet_cidr.description: LAN Subnet CIDR for provisioning a VPC for the NSGv on AWS

provision_vpc_private_subnet_cidr.title: AWS Provision VPC Private Subnet CIDR
provision_vpc_private_subnet_cidr.description: Private Subnet CIDR for provisioning a VPC for the NSGv on AWS

nsg_organization.title: NSG Organization
nsg_organization.description: Organization on the VSD to associate with the NSG being bootstrapped, overrides global setting.

nsg_name.title: NSG Name
nsg_name.description: Name of the NSG on the VSD

match_type.title: Activation Matching Type
match_type.description: Field type to match against for NSGv activation.

match_value.title: Activation Matching Value
match_value.description: Value to match against for NSGv activation.

ssh_service.title: Enable SSH on NSGv
ssh_service.description: Enables SSH on NSGv when set.

nsg_infra_profile_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Name
nsg_infra_profile_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile on the VSD

nsg_template_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Template Name
nsg_template_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile template on the VSD

proxy_dns_name.title: NSG Infra Profile Proxy DNS Name
proxy_dns_name.description: Name of the NSG infra profile proxy DNS on the VSD

ssh_override.title: Allow SSH Access Override
ssh_override.description: Allows NSGs using this profile to override SSH access.

vsc_infra_profile_name.title: VSC Infra Profile Name
vsc_infra_profile_name.description: Name of the VSC infra profile for the NSG on the VSD

first_controller_address.title: VSC Infra Profile First Controller
first_controller_address.description: Host name or IP address of the VSC infra profile first controller for the NSG

second_controller_address.title: VSC Infra Profile Second Controller
second_controller_address.description: Host name or IP address of the VSC infra profile second controller for the NSG

network_port_name.title: NSG Network Port Name
network_port_name.description: Name of the network port for the NSG

network_port_physical_name.title: NSG Network Port Physical Name
network_port_physical_name.description: Physical name of the network port for the NSG

access_port_name.title: NSG Access Port Name
access_port_name.description: Name of the access port for the NSG

access_port_physical_name.title: NSG Access Port Physical Name
access_port_physical_name.description: Physical name of the access port for the NSG

access_port_vlan_range.title: NSG Access Port VLAN Range
access_port_vlan_range.description: VLAN range of the access port for the NSG

access_port_vlan_number.title: NSG Access Port VLAN Number
access_port_vlan_number.description: VLAN number of the NSG access port for the NSG
